entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
